personalInfo.title: Senior Java Software Engineer - AI/ML Systems

summary:
Senior Java Software Engineer with 9+ years of expertise in enterprise software architecture and AI/ML systems integration. Proven track record in designing and implementing high-performance, scalable AI-driven solutions. Core competencies include:

• Java Development: Advanced implementation of Java 11+ applications and microservices
• AI/ML Integration: Experience in implementing and deploying machine learning models in production
• Architecture Design: Expertise in designing distributed AI systems and scalable backends
• Performance Optimization: Deep knowledge of JVM optimization and concurrent programming
• Big Data & Analytics: Experience with large-scale data processing and analytics pipelines
• Cloud & DevOps: Extensive experience with AWS services and CI/CD practices
• Technical Leadership: Strong track record in mentoring teams and driving innovation

Key Achievements:
• Led development of AI-powered fraud detection system processing $100M+ annual transactions
• Implemented machine learning models reducing false positives by 60%
• Achieved 99.99% uptime for critical AI services
• Optimized JVM performance resulting in 45% reduction in processing time

workExperience.title: Senior Java Software Engineer - AI Systems
workExperience.description: Lead architect for AI-powered payment processing systems, focusing on machine learning integration, scalability, and high-availability solutions.
achievements: Architected and implemented AI-powered fraud detection system processing $50M+ monthly transactions
Designed and deployed microservices architecture for ML model serving using Spring Boot and Spring Cloud
Integrated real-time machine learning predictions using Apache Kafka and custom ML pipelines
Optimized JVM performance and concurrent processing, reducing latency by 45%
Implemented comprehensive testing framework for AI components achieving 90% coverage
Led collaboration with data science team for model deployment and monitoring
Mentored team of 5 mid-level engineers in AI integration practices
